# ui-card

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                 | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `horizontal` | `horizontal` | Enable horizontal display                   | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `imageAlt`   | `image-alt`  | Specifies the alternative text of the image | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `imageUrl`   | `image-url`  | Specifies the imageUrl                      | `string`  | `undefined` |
